price: (55) Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
